<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let ms = getArguments(open_argument,'tone_id');

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

// 合并数据
let datas1 = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&cookie={{cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')}}",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "晴天阅读记录",
        "url": base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&key=" + key,
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    }
];

const datas2 = [{
        "title": "书籍排行榜 ٩( ˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́ )و",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    },
    {

        "url": base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&side_type=10',

        "style": {

    },
    {

        "url":base_url + '/discover?page={{page}}&type=3',

        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }];
const datas = datas1.concat(infoData, groupDatas, datas2);


function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let key = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (key) {
            let keyParts = key.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                key = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', key);
                return key;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let keys = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!keys) {
	keys = gets_key();

const groupDatas = [];

function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

// 合并数据

];

    }];
const datas = datas1.concat(infoData, groupDatas, datas2);


function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `${base_url}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

bookSourceComment: 基于 PyFQWeb 鲸落项目开发的 Legado 兼容书源
bookSourceName: 番茄小说无密钥版2鲸落

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.name: book_name

ruleContent.content:
let res = JSON.parse(result).data.content function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
// java.log(u)
if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
else u = u.substring(7)
let uArr = u.split("/")
uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
let uArr2 = []
uArr.forEach((x) => {
    if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
    else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
	})
u = uArr2.join("/")
return u
	}
  let list = [];
  let resultData = JSON.parse(result).data;
  // java.log(resultData)
  let data;
  if (resultData != null && resultData.book_shelf_info) {
    data = resultData.book_shelf_info;
    if (data != null) {
    let requestData = { books: [] };
    for (let i in data) {
      requestData["books"].push({
        book_id: data[i]["book_id"],
        item_id: "0",
      });
    }
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(resultData.book_shelf_info))
    let booksData = java.ajax(
      'https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{method: "post",body: ' +
        JSON.stringify(requestData) +
        "}"
    );
    // java.log(booksData)
    let books =  JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
      let d = books[i];
      list.push({
        src: d,
        book_name: d.book_name,
        thumb_url: replaceCover(d.thumb_url),
        abstract: d.abstract,
        book_id: d.book_id,
      });
    }
    }
  } else list = JSON.parse(result)[0].content
  JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.book_name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

books.forEach(w => {
  results.push(w.book_data[0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)
</js>$[*]

bookSourceComment:
支持番茄真人听书和Ai朗读，搜索时尽量输入书籍全名

新增喜马拉雅听书功能(打赏用户专享)

新增指定来源搜索
20241124更新可用音色提示
20241126修复bug
20241129更新秘钥填写方式
20241217更新服务器切换功能
exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let media = getArguments(open_argument,'media');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}
// 地区分类
const regions = {
    "国漫": "cn",
    "日本": "jp",
    "韩国": "kr",
    "欧美": "en"
};

// 类型分类
const bztypes = {
    "恋爱": "lianai",
    "纯爱": "chunai",
    "古风": "gufeng",
    "异能": "yineng",
    "悬疑": "xuanyi",
    "剧情": "juqing",
    "奇幻": "qihuan",
    "玄幻": "xuanhuan",
    "穿越": "chuanyue",
    "冒险": "maoxian",
    "推理": "tuili",
    "武侠": "wuxia",
    "格斗": "gedou",
    "战争": "zhanzheng",
    "热血": "rexue",
    "搞笑": "gaoxiao",
    "大女主": "danuzhu",
    "都市": "dushi",
    "总裁": "zongcai",
    "后宫": "hougong",
    "日常": "richang",
    "韩漫": "hanman",
    "少年": "shaonian",
    "其他": "qita"
};

let datas = [{
    "title": "全部分类",
    "url": base_url+"/discover?page={{page}}&bztype=all&region=all&state=all&bzfilter=%2a",
    "style": {
        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.2
    }
}];

for (let bztype_k in bztypes) {
    let bztype_v = bztypes[bztype_k];

    let data = {
        "title": '༺༴ '+bztype_k+' ༴༻',
        "url": `${base_url}/discover?page={{page}}&bztype=${bztype_v}&region=all&state=all&bzfilter=%2a`,
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    };
    datas.push(data);

    for (let region_k in regions) {
        let region_v = regions[region_k];
        data = {
            "title": region_k,
            "url": `${base_url}/discover?page={{page}}&bztype=${bztype_v}&region=${region_v}&state=all&bzfilter=%2a`,
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.2
            }
        };
        datas.push(data);
    }
}

JSON.stringify(datas);
</js>

<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

books.forEach(w => {

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

if (result.match(/阅读云/)) {
   u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
   cookie.removeCookie(u)
   // java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
   java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
   ck = cookie.getCookie(u)
   head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
   url = u + "," + head
   result = java.ajax(url)
}
result

    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。

<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header));
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name##《|》

ruleContent.content: if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ result = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl }else{ content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img; }
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0"
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

}

<js>
/*调试->右上角的小虫子，随便搜一个词*/
/*Token写了东西的话要删掉才能进行下面步骤：
①填上电话号码点调试会获取验证码；
②填上验证码点调试会获取token；
③把token填在Token【目录的章节url那也有个token记得也要填，不填的话从发现点的书是没有登录的】；
④把电话号码跟验证码的值删了【❗️填了电话号码会一搜索就发验证码】，保存书源*/
/*如登录过期需要重新登录，请删除以前填写的token再调试获取验证码，重复前面的步骤*/

电话号码="";

验证码="";

Token="34304776fc02d974a641eef13b603e20";

//下面不要动
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
token=java.put('token',Token);
function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}



//获取验证码开始
num=电话号码;
y=验证码;
if(num.match(/^\d{11}$/) && !y  && !Token){
list2=[
 "mobile=86"+num,
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.3",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
s=sign(list2);
json2={ "mobile": "86"+String(num),"product":"1","ver":"2.1.3","sign":s,"sysVer":"10","locale":"CN","token":String(token),"lang-app":"zh-Hans","appId":"","osType":"2","time":time,"packageName":"com.lestory.jihua.an","lang":"zh-hans"}

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": JSON.stringify(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.log(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");
}else if(y && !Token){
list2=[
 "mobile=86"+num,
"code="+y,
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.3",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
s=sign(list2);
json2={ "code":String(y),"mobile": "86"+String(num),"product":"1","ver":"2.1.3","sign":s,"sysVer":"10","locale":"CN","token":String(token),"lang-app":"zh-Hans","appId":"","osType":"2","time":time,"packageName":"com.lestory.jihua.an","lang":"zh-hans"}

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": JSON.stringify(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
java.log(a.msg=="success"?'❗️下面是你的Token，请复制❗️\n'+a.data.user_token:JSON.stringify(a));
}
//获取验证码结束
